Text: Holiday PromotionsJames Hi this is Steve Callaway over at Tom James Clothing Company I just wanted to take a moment and let you know about some of the holiday promotions we are running right now We have the Custom shirt promo buy six custom shirts and get one free We also have our custom wraps these are great deals on custom clothing just for the holidays These all make great gift ideas for family friends and coworkers We have also added a lot to our womens line and have some exciting new things that would make great gifts for the special ladies in your life Dont forget now is the time to start thinking about your formal wardrobe with the holidays just around the corner how is your tux looking these days I would like to meet with you in the next few weeks and show you some of the new things we are doing this season You can just email me to set an appointment or give me a call at EXT I hope things are well with you and I look forward to hearing from you soon Steve Callaway Professional Clothier
